alert.note: Alert for Butler; Harvey; Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harvey, northwestern Butler and Marion Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1200 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gypsum to 9 miles northwest of Canton to 6 miles northwest of Galva to 7 miles west of Mcpherson to near Windom. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton, Hesston, Hillsboro, Halstead, Marion, North Newton, Sedgwick, Peabody, Burrton, Whitewater, Florence, Goessel, Walton, Elbing, Burns, Lincolnville, Ramona, Lehigh, Durham and Tampa. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 23 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
